plug

public void plug(Plug jack)
          throws PlugIncompatibleException,
                 SignalAlreadyConnectedException
used to connect one plug to another (jack) connection is done by connecting signals/plugs with identical pin numbers if at least one pair of signals/plugs is not compatible a PlugIncompatibleException is thrown.

Parameters:
jack - to plug in
Throws:
SignalInCompatibleException
PlugIncompatibleException
SignalAlreadyConnectedException
